Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Eshinyasio eshikhongo shilinyoola buli ulia wokhutiabukha omumoonyi
Aparanga	mbu	omwandu	kukwe kulimutonyia tsinyanga tsiosi
Shikali kario tawe! Ali khwesululwa niyenjisibwa mu Hutwama
Ne nishina shilakhwechesia mbu Hutwama nishina
